verses.name: Leviticus 13:13
verses.text: Then the priest shall consider: and, behold, if the leprosy have covered all his flesh, he shall pronounce him clean that hath the plague: it is all turned white: he is clean.

verses.name: Leviticus 13:14
verses.text: But when raw flesh appeareth in him, he shall be unclean.

verses.name: Leviticus 13:15
verses.text: And the priest shall see the raw flesh, and pronounce him to be unclean: for the raw flesh is unclean: it is a leprosy.

verses.name: Leviticus 13:16
verses.text: Or if the raw flesh turn again, and be changed unto white, he shall come unto the priest;
